mapper.select: select a.* from ma_class_ui a order by a.DATASEQ
mapper.insert:
insert into ma_class_ui (guid, classfk, uiname,
title, uitype, inherited,
businessmodels, dataseq, visible,
templatename, templatetypes,
sortfield1, sortvalue1, sortfield2, sortvalue2, sortfield3, sortvalue3,
groupfield, position,
createuserguid, createtime, updateuserguid, updatetime) values (#GUID#, #CLASSFK#, #UINAME:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#TITLE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #UITYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#INHERITED:VARCHAR:NULL#, #BUSINESSMODELS:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DATASEQ#,
#VISIBLE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TEMPLATENAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TEMPLATETYPES:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#SORTFIELD1:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SORTVALUE1:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SORTFIELD2:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SORTVALUE2:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SORTFIELD3:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SORTVALUE3:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#GROUPFIELD:VARCHAR:NULL#, #POSITION:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#)
mapper.update:
update ma_class_ui
classfk = #CLASSFK#, uiname = #UINAME#, title = #TITLE#, UITYPE = #UITYPE#, inherited = #INHERITED#, businessmodels = #BUSINESSMODELS#, DATASEQ = #DATASEQ#, visible = #VISIBLE#, templatename = #TEMPLATENAME#, templatetypes = #TEMPLATETYPES#, sortfield1 = #SORTFIELD1#, sortvalue1 = #SORTVALUE1#, sortfield2 = #SORTFIELD2#, sortvalue2 = #SORTVALUE2#, sortfield3 = #SORTFIELD3#, sortvalue3 = #SORTVALUE3#, groupfield = #GROUPFIELD#, position = #POSITION#,
updatetime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, updateuserguid = #UPDATEUSERGUID# where guid = #GUID#
